briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Deferasirox in Patients With Transfusion Dependent Iron Overload - a Non-comparative Extension Study
officialTitle: A 5-year Open Label, Non-comparative Extension to a Randomized, Open-label, Phase IIa Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability and the Effects on Liver Iron Concentration of Repeated Doses of 10 and 20 mg/kg/Day of Deferasirox in Comparison With 40 mg/kg/Day Deferoxamine in Patients With Transfusion-dependent Iron Overload
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and the effects on liver iron of Deferasirox when given for a long treatment period in patients with transfusion dependent iron overload.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Relative Change From Baseline in Liver Iron Content (LIC) After Prolonged Use of Deferasirox
